name: memorandum
description:
Memorandum is an application that allows the user to familiarize with the memorization method "the memory palace" and master the technique, allowing him/her to link lists of words to different objects within an environment. The memory palace is a memorization technique that involves the visual association of concepts to some "loci" i.e. large objects within a room, Making an imaginative effort and looking for an association between concepts and object that could help you remember the first one by visually recalling the second. 

In this application you will visit a virtual environment and you will be able to link a list of words to the items in it. An npc will escort you through the experience to teach you about this method. At the end of each room a mini-game will test your progress.

The project has been realized for the Virtual Reality course (a.y. 2022-2023) provided by the Politecnico di Torino.
